mapper.sql: AUCTION_NO, PD_NAME, PD_DESC, BID_UNIT, TO_CHAR(TB_AUCTION.START_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TB_AUCTION.END_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE, BID_CNT, START_PRICE, PD_CNT, PD_STATUS, CATE_NO, SELLER, IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TB_AUC_IMG.CREATE_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CREATE_DATE
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_AUCTION JOIN TB_AUC_IMG USING(AUCTION_NO) JOIN TB_AUC_RECORD USING(AUCTION_NO) WHERE PD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY
BID_PRICE ASC
BID_CNT DESC
PD_CNT DESC
AUCTION_NO DESC

SELECT
FROM TB_AUCTION JOIN TB_AUC_IMG USING(AUCTION_NO) JOIN TB_AUC_RECORD USING(AUCTION_NO) WHERE PD_STATUS = 'Y' AND PD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY
BID_PRICE ASC
BID_CNT DESC
PD_CNT DESC
AUCTION_NO DESC

SELECT A.AUCTION_NO, A.PD_NAME, A.PD_DESC, A.BID_UNIT, TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE, TRUNC(A.END_DATE - SYSDATE, 0) + 1 AS REMAIN_DATE, A.BID_CNT, A.START_PRICE, A.PD_CNT, A.PD_STATUS, M.USER_NAME AS SELLER, A.CATE_NO, I.IMG_PATH, MAX(R.BID_PRICE) AS BID_PRICE FROM TB_AUCTION A JOIN TB_AUC_IMG I ON A.AUCTION_NO = I.AUCTION_NO JOIN TB_AUC_RECORD R ON A.AUCTION_NO = R.AUCTION_NO JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON A.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE A.PD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo} GROUP BY A.AUCTION_NO, A.PD_NAME, A.PD_DESC, A.BID_UNIT, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.BID_CNT, A.START_PRICE, A.PD_CNT, A.PD_STATUS, M.USER_NAME, A.CATE_NO, I.IMG_PATH
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AUCTION SET PD_CNT = PD_CNT + 1 WHERE AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo} AND PD_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO userNo, AUCTION_NO auctionNo FROM TB_SAVE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo}

SELECT TB_AUCTION.AUCTION_NO, PD_NAME, PD_DESC, BID_UNIT, TO_CHAR(TB_AUCTION.START_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TB_AUCTION.END_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE, BID_CNT, START_PRICE, PD_CNT, PD_STATUS, CATE_NO, SELLER, IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TB_AUC_IMG.CREATE_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM TB_SAVE JOIN TB_AUCTION ON TB_SAVE.AUCTION_NO = TB_AUCTION.AUCTION_NO JOIN TB_AUC_IMG ON TB_SAVE.AUCTION_NO = TB_AUC_IMG.AUCTION_NO WHERE PD_STATUS = 'Y' AND TB_SAVE.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_SAVE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO TB_AUCTION VALUES ( SEQ_AUCTION.NEXTVAL, #{pdName}, #{pdDesc}, #{bidUnit}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE + INTERVAL '15' DAY, DEFAULT, #{startPrice}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, null, #{seller}, #{cateNo}, #{userNo} ) INTO TB_AUC_RECORD VALUES ( SEQ_AUCTION.CURRVAL, #{userNo}, #{startPrice}, DEFAULT ) INTO TB_AUC_IMG VALUES ( SEQ_AUCTION.CURRVAL, #{imgPath}, SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT AUCTION_NO FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_AUCTION ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AUCTION SET PD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT AUCTION_NO, BID_PRICE, PD_NAME, PD_DESC, BID_UNIT, TO_CHAR(TB_AUCTION.START_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TB_AUCTION.END_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE, TRUNC(END_DATE - SYSDATE, 0) + 1 AS REMAIN_DATE, BID_CNT, START_PRICE, PD_CNT, PD_STATUS, CATE_NO, SELLER, IMG_PATH FROM TB_AUC_RECORD JOIN TB_AUCTION USING(AUCTION_NO) JOIN TB_AUC_IMG USING(AUCTION_NO) WHERE TB_AUC_RECORD.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND TB_AUCTION.PD_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_AUC_RECORD WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo}
mapper.select: SELECT AUCTION_NO, USER_NO, BID_PRICE, CONDITION FROM TB_AUC_RECORD WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo}

SELECT AUCTION_NO, PD_NAME, PD_DESC, BID_UNIT, BID_CNT, START_PRICE, PD_CNT, PD_STATUS, CATE_NO, SELLER, IMG_PATH, TB_AUC_RECORD.BID_PRICE FROM TB_AUCTION JOIN TB_AUC_IMG USING(AUCTION_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_AUC_RECORD USING(AUCTION_NO) WHERE PD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY
BID_PRICE ASC
BID_CNT DESC
PD_CNT DESC
AUCTION_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT AUCTION_NO, TB_AUC_RECORD.USER_NO, MAX(BID_PRICE) AS BID_PRICE FROM TB_AUC_RECORD JOIN TB_AUCTION USING(AUCTION_NO) WHERE TRUNC(END_DATE - SYSDATE, 3) <= 0 AND PD_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY AUCTION_NO, TB_AUC_RECORD.USER_NO ORDER BY AUCTION_NO) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AUC_RECORD SET CONDITION = 'Y' WHERE AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo} AND BID_PRICE = ( SELECT MAX(BID_PRICE) AS BID_PRICE FROM TB_AUC_RECORD JOIN TB_AUCTION ON(TB_AUC_RECORD.AUCTION_NO = TB_AUCTION.AUCTION_NO) WHERE TRUNC(END_DATE - SYSDATE, 3) <= 0 AND PD_STATUS = 'Y' AND TB_AUC_RECORD.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND TB_AUC_RECORD.AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo} )
UPDATE TB_AUCTION SET PD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE TRUNC(END_DATE - SYSDATE, 3) <= 0 AND AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_AUC_RECORD WHERE 'Y' = (SELECT PD_STATUS FROM TB_AUCTION WHERE AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo} ) AND CONDITION = 'N' AND AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo}
